content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Could you please tell me your initial asking price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Of course, Yi-Nuo. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. I'm open to offers, but I'm confident that the market value is around €900 per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment sounds very attractive. However, I'm looking for a price that is both fair and affordable for me as a student. Could we negotiate a lower price, perhaps closer to €800 per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I must consider the costs of maintaining such a prime location. €800 is lower than my initial expectation, but I'm willing to be flexible for the right tenant. If you can commit to a long-term lease and pay the rent on time, I could consider €850 per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer is very generous, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I'm committed to being a responsible tenant. I can offer €850 per month for the apartment, on the condition that the lease includes a clause for minor repairs and maintenance to be covered by the landlord. Would this be acceptable to you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, Yi-Nuo. While I cannot commit to covering all minor repairs and maintenance, I am willing to be hands-on with any issues that may arise. With your offer of €850 per month, I think we can reach an agreement. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease with a three-month notice period for termination?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm pleased to hear that we can work together to maintain the apartment. A one-year lease with a three-month notice period for termination sounds fair. I'm ready to sign the lease at €850 per month, with the understanding that we will address any maintenance issues promptly. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: No, Yi-Nuo, I think we have covered all the important points. I appreciate your willingness to commit to a long-term lease, and I'm confident that you will be a great tenant. Let's proceed with the lease signing. I agree to the price of €850 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of €850 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
